Title: Stage Door
Cast: Katharine Hepburn, Ginger Rogers, Adolphe Menjou, Gail Patrick, Constance Collier, Andrea Leeds, Samuel S. Hinds, Lucille Ball, Franklin Pangborn, William Corson, Pierre Watkin, Grady Sutton, Frank Reicher, Jack Carson, Phyllis Kennedy
Plot: A boardinghouse full of aspiring actresses and their ambitions, dreams and disappointments. Terry Randall, rich society beauty, has decided to see if she can break into the Broadway theatre scene without her family connections. She goes to live in a theatrical boarding house and finds her life caught up with those of the other inmates and the ever-present disappointment that theatrical hopefuls must live with. Her smart-mouth roommate, Jean, is approached by a powerful producer for more than just a role. And Terry's father has decided to give her career the shove by backing a production for her to star in, in which she's sure to flop. But his machinations hurt more than just Terry. Written by Kathy Li
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
Actors: Katharine Hepburn, Ginger Rogers, Adolphe Menjou
Writer: Morrie Ryskind (screen play), Anthony Veiller (screen play) | 2 more credits »
Description: Directed by Gregory La Cava.  With Katharine Hepburn, Ginger Rogers, Adolphe Menjou, Gail Patrick. A boardinghouse full of aspiring actresses and their ambitions, dreams and disappointments.
